about_the_game:
Welcome to Roulette Heist, where deception, strategy, and raw courage collide in a high-stakes battle for survival. Fight for fortune and your life across two intense modes: Loot Division and the brutal Poker Roulette.

Poker Roulette Mode

  • Texas Hold'em Meets Russian Roulette:

    Each hand of poker is a gamble with your life. Lose, and you'll face the barrel of a loaded revolver.

  • Bullets Are Currency:

    With only six bullets to start, each bet comes at a cost. Raise, fold, or go all-in—just make sure you can back it up.

  • No Escape for Cowards:

    Fold a hand? Prepare to pull the trigger. Survive an empty shot, and you reload with even more bullets for the next round.

  • Winner Takes All:

    Each round ends with winners clearing their guns and losers facing death. Play continues until only one player remains standing.

Loot Division Mode

  • High-Stakes Loot Splits:

    Fight for gold, cash, and priceless paintings. Only those who stand their ground have a chance to claim their share.

  • Bluff or Backfire:

    Secretly choose your moves—fire, bluff, or back down. But beware: even cowards don’t always walk away unscathed.

  • Risk It All or Play It Safe:

    Decide whether to stand tall for the loot or kneel to save your life. One wrong move, and it could all end in bloodshed.

  • The Godfather's Power:

    The Godfather holds the power to command and control, forcing players to redirect their aim and altering the course of the game. But in this high-stakes battle of greed and betrayal, even the Godfather's power isn’t absolute.

  • Winner Takes All:

    The boldest players fight to claim the ultimate prize, but one wrong move can cost everything.

"Your mask hides your face, but not your fear."

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or Greater
  • Processor: Intel 64-bit or Apple silicon
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Greater
  • Processor: x64 SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: In a world of masks, lies, and loaded guns, your fortune is just a trigger pull away. Step into the shadows of a luxurious nightclub casino, don your mask, and join multiplayer in a deadly game of wits and chance. Bullets are your only companions in this life-or-death showdown.
